answers.answer: I have gestational diabetes and thats how I felt but idk if that's an indication that you have diabetes. Even if you do, it's not a really big deal. Just diet changes.
That would be nerves and not a symptom of gestational diabetes. Try to calm yourself down. You're going to be fine.
Panic attack... for dome reason I get anxiety when I get pregnant.
I was fine. Playing on my phone and waiting for the nurse to come out. Then it was like I just ran 5 miles and almost passed out. I've had an anxiety attack before, didn't feel like that to me
That sounds like low blood sugar to me. I hope all is well. When do you get the test results back?

question: I was feeling like I was going to pass out. My heart was pounding and the baby was going crazy. I was a little nauseated too. Is this what happens when u have gestational diabetes??? This did NOT happen with my other two. The nurse took me in back so I could lay down but I am so flipping out. What do u guys think???
title: taking my glucose test right now. HELP!
